title: Sleezo font ID
content:
Can anybody please identify the font pictured below or direct me to something similar?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011064216im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/sleezo_5142.jpg)

 [‹ Superfort font ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011064216/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45971 "Go to previous forum topic") [Primatic Percussion Logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011064216/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45986 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zap_rowsdower

comments.content: Looks hand-painted or printed with old wood type. You probably won’t find an exact match. Everything but the ’S’ looks somewhat like Helvetica Neue condensed bold or Helvetica Inserat. But then again, an ’S’ is probably the hardest letter of the alphabet to draw.
